D3 Visualization

D3.js visualizations portfolio

Interactive D3.js visualizations exploring demographics, population patterns, and sports analytics for exploratory data analysis.

Stack

D3.js, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

Impact

Communicated complex demographic and regional patterns through interactive visualizations that enable exploration and discovery.

A collection of interactive data visualizations built with D3.js to explore patterns in demographics, population data, and sports analytics. These projects demonstrate the power of interactive visualization for exploratory analysis and communicating insights. ## Projects - **DC Demographics**: Interactive visualization exploring demographic patterns across Washington, D.C. - **Wizards Scoring**: Analysis of Washington Wizards scoring patterns and game performance - **Virginia Demographics**: Interactive map and charts exploring demographic data across Virginia counties Each visualization uses D3.js to create responsive, interactive experiences that allow users to explore the data dynamically. The focus is on making complex datasets accessible and discoverable through thoughtful design and interaction patterns. For more D3 projects, visit my [bl.ocks page](http://bl.ocks.org/PH13).

Interactive demos

View the original interactive D3 visualizations on the legacy D3 projects page .
